page.title: 20Starlight Castle
page.content: A long time ago, a member of the Delaval Family wanted to bring a lady to his estate from a diffirent area. Blake Delaval's friend bet him he could not build a castle in 24 hours for her to stay in. The man thought for a while and decided, being a crafty sort to build the miniature Starlight Castle. It was finished within a day, and so the two married. It got its name from the starlight which helped the builders carry on at night. Today only one and a bit walls are left and these could crumble at any minute.
